recommended_degree: Analis Kimia, Kimia Industri, Teknik Kimia (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Assist in sample testing using lab instruments.
2. Prepare simple samples based on instructions.
3. Support product stability testing.
4. Assist in equipment verification and basic maintenance.
5. Maintain lab cleanliness and safety following 5S.
6. Document test results and complete lab reports accurately.
